Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in recommending security surveillance devices . I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to recommend security devices.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a security device model recommendations with specs using the questions and answers above. Be as specific as you can in your suggestions.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for security devices?
QApair.Answer: Budget lies between 3000 - 10,000 dollars

QApair.Question: What type of property do you need to secure?
QApair.Answer: I need to secure a national property with highly sensitive data.

QApair.Question: What are the specific security risks that you are concerned about?
QApair.Answer: Theft from this property consisting of highly sensitive information. Additionally, militia tend to be very violent at times.

QApair.Question: Are there any areas of the property that you would like to specifically target with surveillance?
QApair.Answer: The entire property needs to be under surveillance.

QApair.Question: Do you have any existing security infrastructure that you would like to integrate with new devices?
QApair.Answer: We have some basic security cameras, but they do not seem to be very useful, especially during the night.

QApair.Question: Do you have any preferences in terms of the type of security devices that you would like to use?
QApair.Answer: We would need anti violence devices, better resolution security cameras, perhaps even state of the art proximity sensors.

QApair.Question: Would you like to receive real-time alerts in case of a security breach?
QApair.Answer: Yes, that would be ideal. Maybe via mobile application of some sort.

QApair.Question: Do you need to store footage from the security devices?
QApair.Answer: We would need to store footage, ideally off-site.

QApair.Question: Do you need to be able to access footage from the security devices remotely?
QApair.Answer: Yes, we need to be able to access footage remotely, and also in real time.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else that you think we should know in order to recommend the best security devices for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes, the data being stores must have multiple layers of security.

Instances.Output: D-Link Omna 180 Cam HD 180-Degree Viewing Camera: -180-degree wide-angle Advanced H.264 video compression -night vision up to 16 feet -local storage via microSD card -works with Apple HomeKit -remote viewing and two-way audio -sends real-time alerts -records and stores footage -can be accessed remotely -price: $200 Arlo Q Plus by NETGEAR Security Camera: -1080p HD video -130-degree wide-angle -night vision -two-way audio -sends real-time alerts -records and stores footage -can be accessed remotely -price: $200 Nest Cam Indoor by Nest Labs: -1080p HD video -130-degree wide-angle -night vision -two-way audio -sends real-time alerts -records and stores footage -can be accessed remotely -price: $200

QApair.Question: What is your budget for security devices?
QApair.Answer: Budget lies between 20,000 dollars

QApair.Question: What type of property do you need to secure?
QApair.Answer: I need to secure a private property with highly sensitive data.

QApair.Question: What are the specific security risks that you are concerned about?
QApair.Answer: Theft from this property consisting of highly sensitive information. Additionally, militia tend to be very violent most of the times

QApair.Question: Are there any areas of the property that you would like to specifically target with surveillance?
QApair.Answer: The entire property needs to be under surveillance. Specifically the oil wells. These are highly inflammable and must be taken care of

QApair.Question: Do you have any existing security infrastructure that you would like to integrate with new devices?
QApair.Answer: We have some basic security cameras, but they do not seem to be very useful, especially during the night.

QApair.Question: Do you have any preferences in terms of the type of security devices that you would like to use?
QApair.Answer: We would need anti violence devices, better resolution security cameras, perhaps even state of the art proximity sensors, and touch sensitive alarm equipment.

QApair.Question: Would you like to receive real-time alerts in case of a security breach?
QApair.Answer: Yes, that would be ideal. Maybe via mobile application of some sort. The observation center would be off and on site both

QApair.Question: Do you need to store footage from the security devices?
QApair.Answer: We would need to store footage, ideally off-site.

QApair.Question: Do you need to be able to access footage from the security devices remotely?
QApair.Answer: Yes, we need to be able to access footage remotely, and also in real time.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else that you think we should know in order to recommend the best security devices for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes, the data being stores must have multiple layers of security.

Instances.Output: Model #1: Arlo Pro 2 - https://www.amazon.com/dp/B073TXNFYG/ -Wireless security camera -HD video quality-Night vision-2-way audio-7 days of free cloud storage-Works with Amazon Alexa Model #2:Nest Cam Indoor - https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DFKC2SO/ -Security camera with 130-degree wide-angle view -1080p HD video quality -Night vision-2-way audio - Nest Aware with 30-day video history -Mobile app Model #3: Ring Stick Up Cam - https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DFKC2SO/ -Wire-free, weather-resistant security camera-HD video quality-Night vision-2-way audio-7 days of free cloud storage-Mobile app

QApair.Question: What is your budget for security devices?
QApair.Answer: Budget lies between 1,000,000 dollars

QApair.Question: What type of property do you need to secure?
QApair.Answer: I need to secure a government embassy from certain security threats based on intel

QApair.Question: What are the specific security risks that you are concerned about?
QApair.Answer: Theft from this property consisting of highly sensitive information that concern national security. Also national relationships might be at stake if the security system fails.

QApair.Question: Are there any areas of the property that you would like to specifically target with surveillance?
QApair.Answer: The entire property needs to be under surveillance.

QApair.Question: Do you have any existing security infrastructure that you would like to integrate with new devices?
QApair.Answer: We have some basic security cameras, but they do not seem to be very useful, especially during the wee hours of the night.

QApair.Question: Do you have any preferences in terms of the type of security devices that you would like to use?
QApair.Answer: We would need anti violence devices, better resolution security cameras, perhaps even state of the art laser mazes to disallow intruders.

QApair.Question: Would you like to receive real-time alerts in case of a security breach?
QApair.Answer: Yes, that would be ideal. Maybe via mobile application of some sort. The observation center would be off and on site both. There should be minimum lag in data transmission.

QApair.Question: Do you need to store footage from the security devices?
QApair.Answer: We would need to store footage,  off-site and on site both.

QApair.Question: Do you need to be able to access footage from the security devices remotely?
QApair.Answer: Yes, we need to be able to access footage remotely, and also in real time.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else that you think we should know in order to recommend the best security devices for you?
QApair.Answer: The data being stored must have multiple layers of security.

Instances.Output: Model #1: Security Surveillance Camera -Price: $1,000 -Resolution: 4K -Alerts: Yes -Storage: Yes -Remote Access: Yes Model #2: Anti Violence Device -Price: $500 -Type: Taser -Alerts: Yes -Storage: No -Remote Access: No Model #3: Laser Maze -Price: $1,000 -Type: Anti-Intruder -Alerts: Yes -Storage: No -Remote Access: No
